meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively talkative or chatty.
meanings.sent1: Her garrulousnesses made it hard for others to get a word in during the conversation.
meanings.sent2: His garrulousnesses at the party entertained everyone with his stories.
meanings.sent3: The garrulousnesses of the parrot amused the guests at the event.
meanings.sent4: The garrulousnesses of the stream seemed to never cease as it flowed endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The garrulousnesses of the old radio host made his show a hit among listeners.

meanings.definition: The state of being loquacious or verbose.
meanings.sent1: The professor's garrulousnesses in class often led to longer lectures than planned.
meanings.sent2: Her garrulousnesses during the meeting made it hard to stick to the agenda.
meanings.sent3: The garrulousnesses of the wind seemed to carry on for hours.
meanings.sent4: The garrulousnesses of the engine signaled a need for maintenance.
meanings.sent5: The garrulousnesses of the market trader attracted many customers to his stall.
